reviews.review:
Half-life has a metascore of 96. It's that high for a reason. Half life is coming close to 2 decades old, and you can still have a good time playing the game. The mechanics and half-life engine are the reason we got games like Counter-Strike and Team Fortress Classic. Even today the mechanics leave the game fun to play (even though it takes me an unbelievable number of shots to kill those army guys, the hell is that armor made of?) and the level design ages even better than those.

At this point, the game has been out for about 18 years. It's highly renowned as one of the best games of all time. If you're reading reviews wondering if you should get it, well just buy the damn game already.
my gosh this is good it looked like it might not be but this is awesome

The Best Game Ever! [10000/10]

I played this about 4 years after beating Half life 2. Id say it's a lot better in terms of puzzles, and bunnyhopping, and guns, and bunnyhopping, and gibs, and more amazing bunnyhopping because air control is so good. Argueably half life 2 has a better story but id say both are on par with eachother. 10/10 would bunnyhop again.

Half-Life - легенда, которую никогда не забудут. Игра, которую можно пройти 5,10,15 раз и она ни за что  не надоест. Рано или поздно ты все равно решишь «сесть»  в заветный вагончик, надеть старенький H.E.V. Mk IV и отправиться в невероятное приключение по разрушенному комплексу Black Mesa. Атмосфера игры….ее невозможно передать. После каскадного резонанса  каждый уголок  Mes’ы  начинает таить в себе смертельную опасность. В процессе игры ты не чувствуешь себя супергероем, или универсальным солдатом. Иногда, игра создает ощущение потерянности в бесконечных коридорах комплекса, но поразмыслив логически и найдя ответы на возникшие проблемы, ты продолжаешь двигаться к заветному финалу. Да уж, время летит, а ты все остаешься моей любимой игрой. Спасибо тебе за воспоминания, это было здорово! Спасибо тебе, Half-Life!
Timeless Classic

Questo credo che non necessiti alcuna presentazione: è Half Life insomma! Insieme a Bioshock (e a Deus Ex: 1 HR se vogliamo considerarli FPS) è lo sparatutto migliore della storia per me! La trama è molto intrigante, il gameplay è pazzesco, un level design da maestro e le location sono magiche!  Ha delle piccole pecche: alcuni bug, IA a volte stupida e alcuni problemi di doppiaggio, soprattutto in italiano! Un plauso anche per il Multiplayer che nella sua caoticità è eccellente.

Insomma 
Trama: 8/10
Gameplay: 9 1/2 / 10
Ambientazioni: 9
Level Design: 9
Multiplayer:8
Voto: 9-

Assim... é HALF-LIFE, apenas um clássico que mora no meu coração.

Talvez o jogo não tenha envelhecido lá muito bem e algumas pessoas tenham dificuldade em jogar quando nunca experimentaram nada dessa época, mas ainda assim é uma experiência única. 

Joguei desde minha infância e até hoje volto nele para tentar fazer umas speedruns (não que eu seja bom nisso), me divertir com a AI bugada dos cientistas, ou dar um "impulse 101" nos inimigos. De qualquer forma, ainda é um jogo que me cativa sempre!!!
Great Game!

Clasico de Valve .En el que Ocupamos el Lugar Del cientifico de black mesa Gordon Freeman.
Half-Life narra las aventuras de Gordon Freeman, un investigador del Laboratorio de Materiales Anómalos del Centro de Investigación Black Mesa, un enorme complejo científico subterráneo y ultra secreto instalado en una base militar en desuso emplazada en el desierto de Nuevo México.

A Favor:
-Contamos con una muy buena Historia.
-Buenas Armas.
-Buena Ambientacion /Buenos Mapas.
-IA enemigo Decente
-Excelente Optimizacion.

En contra:
-La IA de Tus amigos (Mililtares,Cientificos,Guardias) es bastante mala ya que se quedan atorados la mayoria de la veces
-Contiene Algunos Bugs por ejemplo el bug del ascensor en power up.

Puntuacion
9/10

I'll be honest; I didn't love Half-Life at first.

Maybe it was the fact that I played this game in 2016, 18 years after its initial release in 1998. Perhaps it was the serviceable but definitely outdated controls  I had to deal with, along with some annoying bugs and glitches. It didn't click for me. But after about an hour of getting used to everything, here's what I realized: Half-Life is real nice. Almost everything wrong with the game comes from technological limitations of the 90s. Graphics really start to show the wear-and-tear of 18 years; but they aren't bad enough to distract from the general gameplay. 

I can't make any more complaints about Half-Life simply because the sum of its parts makes it such a good game. The story still entertains and is delivered well, throwing out lengthy cutscenes and text crawls in favor of gameplay-based storytelling. Enemy AI was amazing for its time and still functions well today; a variety of weapons and unique, challenging level designs keep things interesting through the course of this game. Most importantly, Half-Life retains a remarkable sense of immersion. You do things of your own volition - you never feel like the game is telling you to do something. 

The best and most surprising aspect of this is its genuine difficulty. Make no mistake about it, scrubs: Half-Life is HARD. The game will throw you in tough situations that make you get off your silly high horse and think; try to play this game with the Doom mentality of run-and-gun and you'll get instantly wrecked by its puzzles and smart enemy placement. Playing through Half-Life in 2016 was a chore; it was a struggle. Most importantly, though? It was a genuinely fascinating, enjoyable little 10+ hour trip into the world of an FPS that revolutionized EVERYTHING in the world of video games upon its release. If it were remastered and retweaked today (read: Black Mesa), it would still be one of the best shooters of any generation of gaming.

A definite must-play if you want to stop being a filthy scrub.
Rating: 7 spooky alien baby-heads out of 10.

Sin duda un clásico donde los haya, como Quake y otros títulos similares. Un shooter de la vieja escuela, pero considerablemente el  mejor de su epoca, está lleno de guiños y easter eggs. Con muy buenos detalles. La historia es interesante. Los gráficos son de la época pero posee un diseño muy cuidado. Además posee puzles que le dan variedad. Sin duda es un juego recomendable, por su jugabilidad y la historia. Si los gráficos no te convencen puedes recurrir a la versión Source, o en último lugar jugar la mod, Black Mesa Source. Ya disponible desde su salida en Steam Green light. 
Pero yo recomiendo jugar a esta versión, no olvidemos que es el buque insignia de Valve.
Still plenty fun 'til this day.
说真的，太恶心人了，刚开始还挺好玩，越来越变态

Добрый вечер таки да, в общем в последнее время стало много всего витать вокруг half-life 3, а я ни в одну часть не играл до этого. Ну и собственно подумал, дай ка и я сыграю в эту легендарную игру! Друзья советовали говорили, что этоп росто невероятная серия с глубоким сюжетом и всем тому подобным. Запустил значит я эту iграшку , ну и честно еле терплю её, я пять часов поиграл, и эти пять часов длились вечность, меня максимум хватало на час играть не отрываясь, честно говоря zaebalsya стрелять по кому-то, хоть игра и тяжелая, один huy zaebno это все, тупо скучно становится играть, ОМОН толпами валит, пришельцы тут и там.  Я просто бросил играть, и включил обьяснение сюжета HL на юбубе.
Моя оценка игре 7.7\10 и я её не рекомендую к покупке, лучше потратьте свои shekels на что нибудь другое, а про что HL посмотрите на юбубе , займет минут 20!

Ну что сказать, игра великолепна без всяких сомнений. Помню играл в эту игру очень много, когда был ещё мелким школьником [spoiler]:D[/spoiler]. И до сих пор нравится, играя её в кооперативе.

За меня уже всё здесь сказали, поэтому скажу вам так: берите, берите и ещё раз берите. В неё стоит сыграть, и она вас не разочарует, несмотря что ей уже 17-18 лет.
虽然现在玩画质方面已经不堪入目了，而且很早以前也通关了一次过了，但是看冬季特惠V社好像有出3的意思所以重新从1开始完完整整的重温一下剧情。不得不说虽然画质现在看已经是不堪入目了，但是还是TMD比辐射4好玩多了！！！

[h1] DA PROVARE	[/h1]
Io sono uno di quelli che lo ha provato per la prima volta nel 2015 e mai mi sono divertito così con i giochi "moderni". Ogni volta che riuscivo ad andare avanti mi sembrava di aver risolto un integrale quadruplo. Ho salvato così tante volte che Steam mi dava problemi con la sincronizzazione. Finalmente un gioco dove devi sudare sia col mouse che con la mente mentre i livelli sono veramente ingegnosi,ben strutturati e non a "binario" rendendo il percorso più arduo. Il tutto mischiato con una bella dose di sparatutto ad alieni e a soldati americani. Sono sincero,mi ha colpito come un gioco di 400 mb del degli anni 90 possa competere con giochi di 40gb di oggi.

Para comenzar, me he pasado el juego unas 5 veces, lo tengo en disco desde que salió a la venta, pero el mismo día que se me rompió no pude resistirme y compré el juego en Steam. Este juego es el padre de los FPS con unos gráficos fascinantes para la época en que salió. La historia es una maravilla, mezcla la acción de los FPS con ciencia ficción. Puede que te eche para atrás si estás acostumbrado a los buenos gráficos de los juegos actuales, pero estoy 105% seguro que te divertirás cuando lo juegues!!

Después de tanto escuchar sobre Half Life me dispuse a jugarlo y la verdad me encantó, seguro que próximamente comprare los otros, la jugabilidad es excelente, los gráficos son obsoletos para estar en el 2016 pero imagino que en su época debió ser lo mejor, aunque yo soy una persona que sabe valorar los grandes clásicos sin mirar en absoluto sus gráficos.

Pros:

- Jugabilidad
- Variedad de armas
- Variedad de enemigos
- El poder usar a otras personas para objetivos secundarios
- Basicamente todo xD

Contras:

- El unico contra que le veo a este juego es que habían muchos bugs por todos lados (evitables si sabías por donde ir) en donde te quedabas enganchado al piso y la unica posiblidad era suicidarse o que te mataran.

Pero bueno, en definitiva para ser un juego de hace casi 20 años esta muy bien, seguro que alguna vez lo volvere a jugar

¿Que se puede decir sobre Half-Life?... Es un increíble juego que lo tiene casi todo Las gráficas están bien, la ambientación muy buena, la trama entretenida y graciosa, tiene sus momentos de teorías conspirativas que puedes crear; la jugabilidad es muy práctica y esos momentos de ¿A dónde voy?, siempre volteas y miras bien, lo puedes hacer. Prácticamente un FPS único como él solo. Para mí es un 9/10 algo único que con los juegos de ahora último se extraña.

I recognize this game is ground-breaking and a pioneer to the modern first person shooter, but frankly, I find it boring. It's aggressively linear, drags on needlessly, and the buggy ladder physics killed me more times than the aliens and (spoilers) marines combined. The sequel(s) are excellent, so I don't mean to detract from the series as a whole, but as for this particular game, I wouldn't recommend playing it. Read a plot synopsis and skip to Half-Life 2.

Half Life. Oh man, this is the huge one. The big juggernaut that I can say still holds on somehow.
WARNING EXPECT SPOILERS:
Serious Version: You play as Gordon Freeman, a 27-year old C.I.T Graduate working in Black Mesa. You are about to insert a pure Xen crystal and a resonance cascade, causing all of Black Mesa to go into chaos. You fight against the following:
-Headcrabs
-Houndis
-Zombies
-Marines
-Bullsquids
-Vortigaunts
-Alien Grunts
-Flying Brain Aliens
-The Black Ops
-Giant Vortigaunt looking things
-Barnicles
-AND SO MUCH MORE!
The Marines comes in, want you, wants answers, makes assumptions, attacks you. They're a bunch of dicks. Hell, you're left for dead in a trash compactor (*insert witty reference to Star Wars here*). You then go to Lambda Core and talk to scientists to flood a reactor, leading you to Xen. Killing a bunch of aliens, inhabitants of Xen. Then going to Nihilanth, the last of his' kind, killing him, then takes you the G-Man, who now owns Xen, and offers you a job to do stuff, or death. Death makes you fight a bunch of Xen Enemies; It is non-cannon. Accepting G-Man's offer is the cannon ending, this leads to Half-Life 2. Overall, as I've said before, Half-Life still holds ground as a big game and is amazing in difficulty, gameplay, and story.

Not Serious Version: You play as Gorgeous Freeman, a 27-year old C.I.T (Cambridged Institute of Technololgy) Graduate working in White Mesa. You are about to insert a yellow crystal and shit happens, causing all of White Mesa to become a scary place where scary stuff happens. You go up against this stuff:
-ALIENS N' STUFF
-MILITARY PEOPLE
-THE WHITE OPS
-A GIANT FUCKING BABY
The Military are a bunch of poo-poo heads. You then go for revengance after being nearly turned into a pancake (which would taste delicious). You then go to Half-Life Symbol Core, then going to Zen, a world of evil aliens and stuff. COMITTING MASS GEONOCIDE AGAINST AN ALIEN RACE IS FUN! YOU LISTEN TO AN EVIL BABY WISPER STUFF AND THEN makes you fight him. After opening his' mind, you are taken to the GG-Man, who now is in control of this place. And offers you a new boring job, or a fight against CUTE FLUFFY BUNNIES. Waiting too long takes you to the CUTE FLUFFY BUNNIES. Taking GG-Man's new job gives you a job with no wage, and the ability to fight stuff for the rest of your life. And in the end, Gorgeous Freeman is a sexy man with a sexy face and a sexy butt with an arsenal  that would make just about every video game badass shit their pants made of gold.
